to treat everyone equally favorably (idiom); not to discriminate between people

sentences.english: all of people in the office concerned about she ,because no one has seen her lately.
sentences.chinese: 近来谁也不曾见过她，这使办公室所有同仁深感不安。

sentences.english: I’d like to thank all my colleagues in the company for their support and hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我要感谢公司全体同仁们的支持与努力。

sentences.english: Wendy continues to introduce Michael to the accounting personnel in their accounting division.
sentences.chinese: 温蒂继续向迈可介绍会计课的同仁。

sentences.english: For colleagues in the East, the anguish is extra presumable to come via a pay cut.
sentences.chinese: 而对于东方“同仁“们来说，可能只是减薪而已。

sentences.english: The new law discriminates between people employed in the same firm.
sentences.chinese: 新法规对在同一公司工作的人不一视同仁。

sentences.english: To explore a range of responsibilities, to seek to colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 责任范围作一探讨，以求教于同仁。

sentences.english: The view of this article is that A long is the most special one of the "Qiyue Poets School" poets.
sentences.chinese: 本文认为阿垅是“七月派”同仁中最特异的一个诗人。

sentences.english: The fact that she has not been seen recently disturbs everybody in the office.
sentences.chinese: 近来谁也不曾见过她，这使办公室所有同仁深感不安。

sentences.english: Heaven and earth do not act emotional, of all things equally.
sentences.chinese: 天地不情感用事，对万物一视同仁。

sentences.english: There is no..You're like everybody else in my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 别误会，我对大家一视同仁。

sentences.english: I hope these suggestions will encourage the CCLAA staff to improve it even more.
sentences.chinese: 希望这些建议可以鼓励文贝网的同仁并让文贝网更好。

sentences.english: Previously our slogan was 'Where there is Chinese, there is Tong Ren Tang.
sentences.chinese: 过去我们的口号是“有中国人的地方就有同仁堂。”

sentences.english: Ahern to get some cabinet members and party colleagues behind, ride out the storm.
sentences.chinese: 埃亨获得一些阁僚和党内同仁力挺，渡过难关。

sentences.english: Accounting department workers need to be completely familiar with GAAP.
sentences.chinese: 会计部同仁必须完全熟悉公认会计原则。

sentences.english: He is now engaged in English teaching and research and the member of The Vineyard Poetry Quarterly .
sentences.chinese: 现从事英语教学与研究，为《葡萄园》诗社同仁。
迈克喜爱孩子，一视同仁。

definition: a person with knowledge and experience (idiom)
friend from whom you can seek advice
all walks of life/all social circles
person of the same profession/of the same trade, occupation or industry
not to stint/to be generous (with praise etc)/to be prepared to (pay a fee, give of one's time etc)
to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
